#### Paper Stickers _POPULAR_

Affordable paper sticker printing that completes your product labeling &
packaging. Customize your stickers with various choices available.

#### Vinyl Stickers _WATERPROOF_

Choose the most durable vinyl stickers that are waterproof even weatherproof.
Exceptional quality and suitable for any application.

$20.00

#### Special Stickers

Brand your products or customize labelling with our special premium stickers.
Available in foil paper, hologram, embossed, & dome.

$20.00

#### Die Cut _POPULAR_

Keep your artwork and designs in great shape when creating them with die-cut
stickers. We provide the cheapest price for Square & Rectangle shapes.

$44.00

#### Kiss Cut

Kiss cut is a great supply of stickers whilst keeping the backing paper.
Suitable for effortless application & available in all sticker material.

$20.00

#### Sheet

Print your sticker design with different shapes and cutting styles on a single
sheet. Sticker sheets are reasonable if you need smaller quantities.

$47.00

#### Roll

Roll sticker supply is effortless in peeling & applying to label products and
other items. This tool is time-efficient and budget-friendly for large-scale
production.

$20.00

# _Cheap Online_ Custom Sticker Printing In Canada

###### Leading sticker printing specialist at the most affordable cost. Your
one-stop-shop for quality custom stickers for all sorts of needs.

Welcome to StickerCanada where design and printing custom stickers is our
expertise. Whether promoting your business, brands, products, and services,
not to mention that it's also applicable as giveaways on an event, birthday,
wedding, christening, and other DIY projects. We live to meet your
expectations either for personal or business needs.

Our custom printed stickers are made of high-quality materials at the cheapest
price. You can find any shape, size, color, and finish to satisfy your
marketing and creative expression. With the support of our skilled designers,
we can print custom stickers precisely according to your designs and
specifications.

We are proud of our secured delivery system: Quick, Efficient, and FREE
Canada-wide.

### Reliable Sticker Printing

Trusted custom sticker printing company that caters to small and large
businesses. We aim to help with your print marketing needs with our affordable
custom-printed stickers.

#### Ordering Made Easy

Order custom stickers at ease using a simple checkout process. Payment can be
made via PayPal, credit card, or Bank Transfer.

#### Free Artwork Setup

Create a perfect logo & design for your sticker even if you have no talent in
graphic design. Send us the best version of your artwork, and let us improve
them according to your preferences. This is free for simple designs only.

#### Free Proofing & Shipping

We offer free online proofing and fast shipping Canada-wide. Rest assured,
your orders are delivered on time to your doorstep. Note that our free
shipping is only for selected products.

#### Print More & Save More

We guarantee a cheap price when you print custom stickers and labels in bulk
quantities. Save more while enjoying our best deals.

#### Sample Pack

Get your sample pack for the best material quality checking before you make
bulk orders. You may initially buy 100 personalized stickers through our paid
custom sample pack.

#### Earn & Pay Using Points

You will earn points for every completed transaction. These can be used as
payments when you order next time.
